attributes.action: Drop their plans to withdraw the drug Co-proxamol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This drug is widely used to help relieve pain from sufferers of arthritus.
In many, many instances it is the only pain relieve that works.
It is cheap, has no known side effects and is only available on prescription.
Doctors are against it's withdrawal.
The government plan to withdraw it only because one or two people have abused it.
Withdrawing the drug will not solve the problem, only move these people on to taking something else, whilst at the same time depriving the people who benifit from it
